title: IModelDoc2.SketchModifyTranslate
description: Translates the coordinate system of the active or selected sketch.
signature:
void SketchModifyTranslate( 
   System.Double
StartX
,
   System.Double
StartY
,
   System.Double
EndX
,
   System.Double
EndY
)

parameters.name: StartX
parameters.description: X sketch value defining the from-position

parameters.name: StartY
parameters.description: Y sketch value defining the from-position

parameters.name: EndX
parameters.description: X sketch value defining the to-position

parameters.name: EndY
parameters.description: Y sketch value defining the to-position

returns: The sketch is translated from the XY start point position to the XY end point position.
